name: SMoL (Lucas Kauff)
description:
In SMoL, the player embodies an astronaut which goal is to help a tiny extraterrestrial civilization to develop itself!

You control a hand as if it was a UFO-catcher claw with a Xbox Controller :

There are 3 puzzles we managed to develop within the 48h game jam we participated in, good luck on solving them!

The team:

Mirijam Missbichler - Nathan Zwald - Adel Tebib - Léo Fornini - Lucas Kauff
